name: df-sx
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(csx, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cfv(csigagen, crn(cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), cxp(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ sX =(s0 ∈ 𝕌, s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(sigaGen ` ran((s2 ∈ s0, s3 ∈ s1 ↦(s2 × s3)))))
comment: Define the product sigma-algebra operation, analogous to ~ df-tx . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Jun-2017.)
